symbol description
addGroup() add a new group, group should be plain string, characters in
addGroupMembers() add new members to an existing group
caputwait() set pvs and waiting until the setting takes effect
correctOrbit() correct the orbit with given BPMs and Trims
correctOrbitPv() correct orbit use direct pv and catools
createLocalBump() create a local bump at certain BPM, while keep all other orbit untouched
eget() get elements field values
getBeamlineProfile() return the beamline profile from s1 to s2
getBeta() get the beta function from stored data.
getBpms() return a list of bpms object.
getChromaticity() get chromaticity Not Implemented Yet
getChromaticityRm() Not implemented yet
getClosest() Get the closest element in group
getCurrent() Get the current from the first ‘DCCT’ element
getCurrentMode() Not implemented yet
getDispersion() get the dispersion
getDistance() return distance between two element name
getElements() searching for elements.
getEta() get the dispersion from stored data
getFastOrbit() return fast 10kHz turn-by-turn BPM data.
getFftTune() get tune from FFT
getGroupMembers() Get all elements in a group. If group is a list, consider which op:
getGroups() Get all groups own these elements, ‘*’ returns all possible groups,
getLifetime() Monitor current change with, calculate lifetime dI/dt
getLocations() Get the location of a group, i.e. a family, an element or a list of
getModes() Not implemented yet
getNeighbors() Get a list of n elements belongs to group. The list is sorted along s
getOrbit() Return orbit
getPhase() get the phase from stored data
getPvList() return a pv list for given element list
getRfFrequency() Get the frequency from the first ‘RFCAVITY’ element
getRfVoltage() Get the voltage of the first ‘RFCAVITY’ element
getStepSize() Return default stepsize of a given element
getSubOrm() get submatrix of Orm
getTbtOrbit() return turn-by-turn BPM data.
getTune() get tune
getTuneRm() Not implemented yet
getTunes() get tunes from [‘machine’, ‘database’]
initNSLS2() initialize the NSLS2 accelerator lattice ‘SR’, ‘LTD1’, ‘LTD2’, ‘LTB’.
initNSLS2V1() initialize the virtual accelerator ‘V1SR’, ‘V1LTD1’, ‘V1LTD2’, ‘V1LTB’ from
initNSLS2V1SRTwiss() initialize the twiss data from virtual accelerator
initTLS() initialize the Taiwan Light Source accelerator lattice ‘SR’.
measBeta() Measure the beta function by varying quadrupole strength
measChromRm() measure chromaticity response matrix
measChromaticity() Measure the chromaticity
measDispersion() measure dispersion
measOrbitRm() Measure the beta function by varying quadrupole strength
removeGroup() Remove a group if it is empty. It calls
removeGroupMembers() Remove a member from group
setRfFrequency() set the rf frequency for the first ‘RFCAVITY’ element
stepRfFrequency() change one step of the ‘RFCAVITY’ element
waitStableOrbit() set pv to a value, waiting for timeout or the std of monipv is greater
